messages.message: Thanks! This is interesting, I like that users can specify the columns on the pdf directly instead of scanned text. It’s something I want to add on Table Refiner. I wonder how well it actually works though… don’t know if any of our clients mentioned Docparser.

one explanation for why we havent run into them is that their gtm is extremely different from ours, bottom-up swipe your cc tableau-style, and their ocr story also seems squirrelly (most of their demos are around PDF-with-text to text)
it looks very similar in terms of table script used in bank statements.. we have these column and row filters...
we are missing the UI though :grimacing:
